title: STAT+: Trump administration revives effort to launch pilot initiative reworking drug discount program
description: The Trump administration is attempting another pilot program that would alter payments for medicines purchased through a controversial federal drug discount program.
content: The Trump administration is attempting another pilot program that would alter payments for medicines purchased through a controversial federal drug discount program.
